phrases: Why...
Why have I gone back?
Sir, sir, you do not seem to be feeling well.
Are you all right?
Sir, sir, you seem to have a stomachache.
You did not soil yourself, did you?
You do not... remember me?
So it is like none of it ever happened?
Sir?
Sir, you should not try to move so suddenly.
What happened, damn it?!
Everything reset again!
Including my promise with Emilia!
You entered without even knocking?
What a rude one you are!
Sorry...
Just let me stay here for a bit, please.
There was last time and again now.
How are you breaking through my Door Crossing?
Beatrice...
Addressing me with no title, I suppose?
You said I broke through your Door Crossing last time and now, right?
I just teased you about it, three or four hours ago, for being so insensitive.
If this is the second time I have woken up in the mansion...
Then you remember me, right?
If I could, I would rather erase you from my memory, I suppose.
So the conditions are different from last time...
The save point's changed from near the guy with the appas
to the two angelic girls in maid uniforms.
How did I die?
Everything was normal before I fell asleep.
Even after I fell asleep, I was not in any situation I felt might be fatal...
I wondered what you were muttering about, and I hear all this about living and dying.
By human standards, discussing such things is boring and senseless, I suppose.
In the end, you will only get lies and abusive speech.
Thanks, you were a big help.
I did not do anything.
Somehow, seeing that your attitude never changes calms me down.
Only an ultimate pervert would be calmed by verbal abuse, I suppose.
You are leaving, I suppose?
Yeah, I want to double check something.
I will wait until afterward to get depressed.
Yeah, I knew it.
Subaru!
You are absolutely shining...
I was worried about you!
Ram and Rem were in a frenzy,
saying you disappeared right after you woke up!
Sorry about that...
I got held up by Beatrice for a bit.
Again?
I heard she played a trick on you before you woke up, too...
What is it?
Is there something on my face?
Yeah, your adorable eyes, ears, nose, and mouth.
Uh, I mean...
I am glad you are okay.
Yeah, I am fine.
You protected me, after all.
What about you?
How are you feeling?
I feel great!
I am a little low on blood,
all my mana was stolen,
the shock of waking up sapped my strength,
and I feel like my mind's taken a fatal beating with a bat,
but I am good!
I see, that is g Huh?
Would not that mean you are hurt all over?
Hi, Subaru...
Great morning, is not it?
I cannot thank you enough for yesterday.
I have to thank you somehow.
Then, let me pet your fur whenever I want!
That is all?
Okay, let us go!
Our time is limited, and our world is grand.
And Emilia-tan's and my story has only just begun!
True...
Wait, what did you just say?
Where did the tan come from?
I do not know whose idea of a prank this is,
but I will make you sorry for all of it.
Do not underestimate how vindictive I will be,
after the smile that charmed me that night.
I am going to keep my promise to Emilia!
I will get past that night!
Now, state your desire!
In that case, I have but one request.
Hire me to work in this mansion!
Hic.
It is how these looping plots work.
Follow the same path, and you will end up in the same place.
That is too large for you, Barusu.
It appears nothing here will fit except women's clothes.
Rem, alter that one for him.
Yes, Sister.
Take my measurements, then.
A man can withstand all kinds of awkwardness!
We will measure you later.
Huh?
Follow me, Barusu.
Are you going to show me around?
That can wait, as well.
You will help me with my work first.
Hey, wait!
Retrace the same path I took yesterday...
That is what I meant to do, but...
This is totally different from last time.
It is like making a cheat sheet,
but when you see the answers, you realize it is the wrong subject.
A total waste of effort.
Hi, there!
May I join
No, you may not.
This facility is part of my mansion,
so it is my property...
I shall do with it as I please.
Why bother asking, then?
If you want, take a bath.
My, how harsh!
And you seem not to understand.
Yes, this bath is my property...
But as part of my staff,
are you not my property, as well?
Chomp.
No hesitation at all!
This is turning out different from what I would expected, too.
I do not know what is bothering you,
but life is full of things that fail to go your way.
Speaking of which,
do you think you will be able to get along with Ram and Rem?
I have not spoken to Rem much yet,
but I get along fine with Ram.
In fact, I think she might be getting a little too friendly.
I cannot believe she can work as a maid that way.
Well, Rem covers what Ram cannot.
As sisters, they must help each other.
In that sense, I think they get by quite well.
Ram is just the inferior version of her sister,
and all Rem does is cover for her...
And yet they insist Ram is superior because she is older.
Their nerve is almost scary.
Speaking of nerve, yours appears quite impressive, as well!
Damn, I am dizzy from that bath.
Stupid Roswaal...
Cover up that sorry thing.
Why are you here?
I was only waiting to help Roswaal-sama put on fresh clothes.
I am sorry to say that I have finished my bath,
so I will not be changing.
I was not thinking about that!
Also, you spoil him too much!
Let him dress himself!
I will not condone disrespect toward Roswaal-sama.
Next time, I will use force.
Any more, and I will just stir up a hornet's nest...
By the way, Barusu, do you have plans after this?
No, just going to sleep.
Then please wait in your room.
I will come by later.
Huh?
She did not mean anything...
She did not mean anything by it.
Clear my mind, clear my mind!
Emilia-tan is the only one for me!
Calm down, calm down...
One Emilia-tan, two Emilia-tans, three Emilia-tans...
Am I in Heaven?!
You are too noisy, Barusu.
It is nighttime.
Be quiet.
Eep!
Barusu, come over here.
Wait, my heart's already set on someone named Emilia-tan!
What are you talking about?
I told you to sit here, so I can teach you to read and write.
That is news to me!
But where is this coming from?
I could tell by watching you that you cannot read or write.
If you cannot read or write, I cannot send you shopping,
and you cannot write down orders.
We will start with this collection of children's fairy tales.
Starting tonight, I will help you study every evening.
Why are you being so nice to me?
Why else?
It is so that I...
No, it is so I can get off easy.
That was not correcting yourself!
You are never out of character, are you?
Well, is not it obvious?
The more you can do,
the less I have to do.
And when I have less to do, so does Rem.
It is win-win.
But that leaves me with piles of work!
We will start with the basic i-glyphs.
After you master them, we will move to ro-glyphs and ha-glyphs.
There are three different types?
Just hearing that is depressing...
Natsuki Subaru
On the scene!!
You do not have time to waste on doodles.
Tomorrow's an early start, so time's short.
I am sleepy, too.
I cannot say I dislike how you insert your own feelings at the end, Senpai.
I do believe honesty is my most charming feature.
Now, let us begin.
It is so monotonous, I feel a Gestaltzerfall phenomenon coming on...
But still, even if it is to make your life easier, it makes me happy.
Honestly, I had the feeling you did not like me much.
And I will probably because more problems for you down the line.
But I will try to become useful as soon as I can.
Wow...
I hate to admit it, but it is perfect.
Guess there is no need for my sewing skills this time...
Sewing skills?
Do you like sewing?
Kind Of.
By the way, it looks like Ros-chi and Emilia-tan have lots of outfits,
but I do not see any for you and Rem-rin.
Want me to sew some for you?
I will take your measurements.
That is unnecessary.
These uniforms are all my sister and I need.
How can you have nothing but those uniforms?
Are all your clothes maid outfits?
They because no problems when we accompany Roswaal-sama on business,
or when we work in the mansion.
They also eliminate the need to explain our place in the hierarchy,
which makes them very logical.
But it is not about being logical.
I am trying to say cute girls
have a duty to dress up, so they please the eyes of others.
My sister is one thing,
but no one would be happy to see me dress up.
Well, I would.
Would any good come of making you happy?
I might take more pride in my work here,
which could boost my productivity.
I have no idea what makes you say that.
I would also look forward to seeing the differences
in your sartorial choices...
That is none of your concern.
Does my looking the same as my sister somehow inconvenience you?
You love your sister way too much.
Ow!
You do not know how to handle a knife, Barusu.
I know...
You hold the knife still and turn the vegetable, right?
It is embarrassing when you stare at me so intently...
Your unsightly appearance stands out.
Especially your hair.
It is very unrefined.
I thought I did a pretty good job of cutting it by myself.
By the way, in this mansion, Rem sees to everyone is hair.
She styles my hair and dresses me every morning, too.
Is not it nice?
Try to contribute a little, Sis!
Rem...
If you like, you can tidy up Barusu's hair a bit.
Sister?
Whoa, whoa...
Having a girl mess with my hair will get me all worked up
You keep looking at Barusu because his hair bothers you, right?
Yes, that is correct.
I think combing it and evening out the ends
would make him more presentable.
You heard her.
You should take her up on her offer.
Her hands will take you to paradise.
You make it sound so dirty...
If you do not want to, you should just tell her.
Not that I do not want you to, but...
No, that is not it.
The truth is that it did bother me a little...
very much, a little... extremely, a little.
Well, anyway, that proves the point that it bothers you.
What is the matter, Betty?
Nothing, Bubby.
More importantly, I have delicious sweets today, I suppose.
Eat them with me!
Yum!
What is up?
Here to help me?
No, this is about what we discussed at lunchtime.
Lunchtime?
Oh, about my hair?
You will really style it for me?
No, I felt that I said some things that were uncalled for.
I am very sorry.
We may be colleagues, but as Emilia-sama's savior,
your rank surpasses mine.
That is how you feel?
Sorry to put you through that.
No, I should apologize for saying something so pointless.
Please forget it.
I guess it is never that easy.
That is what makes being human so hard.
Okay, I will give you a condition, then!
If you agree to it, I will forget everything you just said.
A condition?
Very well, I shall hear you out.
If you comb my hair a bit and even out the ends, I will let it slide!
When you respond with silence, it actually hurts even more...
It is just as Emilia-sama said.
You have no ambition at all.
It is weird...
I would think that would make you fall for me all over again, not disgust you.
My sister said your eyes take on an obscene look when she is alone with you.
So to be honest, I was prepared to hear you suggest that.
She is killing my reputation!
I accept your condition.
I shall do as you wish.
Then, after I keep my promise to Emilia-tan would be great.
Promise?
Well, I have not made the promise yet.
Scoping out our date destination before I make the promise might be smart...
I have researched places with the best views!
That just leaves...
Subaru!
He is back!
And his face looks weird again!
I need to make sure these guys do not find us.
What do you mean by find you?
Did you pee your pants?
We are playing hide-and-seek?
Chill, brats!
I played with you earlier!
Let us play more!
Play!
Play!
Change your pants!
All right, listen up.
Next time I come here, I will be on a date.
Try to take a hint, okay?
I will allow this little critter to play with Emilia-tan, though.
Ow!
Again?!
Subaru-kun, so this is where you were.
Are you all right?
I am fine, I am fine...
All done shopping, Rem-rin?
Yes, it went quite smoothly.
Aw, you are leaving?
Do not go!
You have somewhere to go home to?
You were quite popular with them.
For some reason, kids have always liked me...
Like animals, children observe a hierarchy.
They can tell if it is all right to belittle someone.
Those brats...
They have no respect.
Did you show them anything about you worth respecting?
That is a sound argument.
Still, it does not seem right to belittle me from the start.
Ram seems like she would handle that kind of thing well.
My sister is wonderful, is not she?
Honestly, I would think her personality
would cause conflict more often than not.
My sister's self-assured nature is what makes her so charming.
I cannot be that way at all.
By the way, how are your studies progressing?
Let us just say I am plugging along.
Ram is actually a pretty good teacher, too.
Though I wish she would not sleep on my bed in mid-lesson.
It kind of kills my motivation.
My sister only acts that way to stimulate your motivation.
Why do you have such absolute faith in your sister?
That is not normal...
You are totally fanatical like a demon.
Fanatical like a demon?
It is the demon version of divine possession.
Sounds kind of cool, right?
Do you like demons?
Well, gods generally do not do anything,
but demons will laugh along when you talk about future plans.
Especially for next year and stuff.
They will laugh their heads off.
That smile is a million volts!
I am going to tell Emilia-sama.
I was not trying to hit on you!
Both Ram and Rem said they would not be coming to see you tonight,
so I agreed to help with your studies.
I am afraid I cannot do much, though.
Right now, I am writing the basic i-glyphs until I memorize them...
Wow!
You are studying a lot more intensely than I imagined!
S-Since these fairy tales are aimed at kids,
it is mostly i-glyphs, or so they said...
So my goal for now is to be able... to read this...
Anyway, um...
Th-The moon sure is pretty.
Huh?
No!
I mean, um, I have a favor to ask you.
Will you listen?
Starting tomorrow, I will work hard, and I will study, too!
Go on a date with me.
What does a date entail?
When a guy and a girl go out alone together, that is a date!
Only the goddess of love knows what will happen during that time...
Then that means you went on a date with Rem today, right?
Ugh!
I did not expect that response!
That did not count!
Please do not count that!
I understand that you want us to go out together, but where?
Actually, there is this really cute little dog in the nearby village.
There is a flower field, too.
I want to see you in a field of flowers,
and capture the image for eternity with my metia!
Oh, um...
The village, huh?
The dog is super cute!
Let us go!
But it might cause trouble for you.
And for the villagers
The kids are so pure and innocent, they are like angels!
Let us go!
Oh, all right.
You leave me no choice.
I will go with you.
And the flower field is super colorful and wonderfu Really?
If that will motivate you to work hard from tomorrow on, then I will.
All right!
I bet the weather will be lovely tomorrow.
Yeah...
And it will be a day I will never forget.
There you go again with...
You were just...
Never mind.
You know, it makes a guy really anxious when you do not finish your sentences.
Okay, Subaru-kun the butler,
remember to work hard.
Only those who work hard are rewarded,
so this will be a reward!
All right, let us settle this, fate...
I will not sleep tonight, no matter what.
I will stay awake to greet the morning of my promise.
Jeez...
What am I, a grade schooler who cannot sleep before a class outing?
Reminds me of when I overslept on the day of the class trip...
I was not able to retrace the same loop exactly,
but I got along well with Ram and Rem.
In fact, I think I did better than last time.
If there is anything I feel I missed,
it is not saying goodnight to Beatrice.
Each time I saw her, all we did was insult each other.
But maybe I should have... at least... thanked her...
What is this?
I am so cold...
No...
Could this be...
Someone...
Someone...
Help.
What just...
The Morning of Our Promise Is Still Distant
